title: ‘First and Last Time as Champion in Tábor’: Mathieu van der Poel Hints End Is Nigh Ahead of Hunt for Historic Sixth CX World Title
content:
Sunday's race in Tábor could be Van der Poel's last cyclocross worlds. Will his winter have been a waste without a sixth rainbow jersey?

Read the full article at ‘First and Last Time as Champion in Tábor’: Mathieu van der Poel Hints End Is Nigh Ahead of Hunt for Historic Sixth CX World Title on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
